scenario.send:
INVITE sip:adhoc@rcse-dls-capacity.mavenir.lab SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] Max-Forwards: 70 Call-ID: 2000///[call_id] From: "[field0]" <sip:+1[field0]@rcse-dls-capacity.mavenir.lab>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag02[call_number] To: "adhoc" <sip:adhoc@rcse-dls-capacity.mavenir.lab> CSeq: 1 INVITE Expires: 3600 Route: <sip:rcse-dls-capacity.mavenir.lab:5060;lr;orig> Accept-Contact: *;+g.3gpp.icsi-ref="urn%3Aurn-7%3A3gpp-service.ims.icsi.oma.cpm.largemsg" Contribution-ID: GROUP_LM_SIP-[call_id] Conversation-ID: GROUP_LM_SIP-[call_id] Accept: application/sdp Session-Expires: 3600;refresher=uac Min-SE: 600 Subject: grp Event: conference Allow: INVITE,ACK,BYE,CANCEL,UPDATE,PRACK,SUBSCRIBE,NOTIFY,MESSAGE,REFER Supported: 100rel,from-change,norefersub,replaces,timer Content-Type: multipart/mixed;boundary=boundary1 Content-Length: [len] Contact: <sip:[local_ip]:[local_port]>;+sip.instance="<urn:gsma:imei:[$8Digit]-[$2Digit]0000-0>";+g.3gpp.icsi-ref="urn%3Aurn-7%3A3gpp-service.ims.icsi.oma.cpm.session";+g.3gpp.icsi-ref="urn%3Aurn-7%3A3gpp-service.ims.icsi.oma.cpm.largemsg" P-Asserted-Identity: <sip:+1[field0]@rcse-dls-capacity.mavenir.lab> User-Agent: CPM-client/OMA1.0 MSP/1.0 P-Served-User: <sip:+1[field0]@rcse-dls-capacity.mavenir.lab>;sescase=orig;regstate=reg P-Charging-Function-Addresses: ecf="aaa://mavenir.lab";ecf="aaa://mavenir.lab" P-Access-Network-Info: MavenirSCSCF P-Visited-Network-ID: scscf.mavenir1.com Require: recipient-list-invite

v=0 o=- 1281754238589 1281754238589 IN IP6 [local_ip] s=Capacity testing c=IN IP6 [local_ip] t=0 0 m=MESSAGE 3000 TCP/MSRP * a=path:msrp://[local_ip]:3000/[field0];tcp a=sendrecv a=setup:active a=max-size:2048000 a=accept-types:message/cpim a=accept-wrapped-types:* a=file-selector:size:1258292 a=file-transfer-id:[field0]VinayLM
